      • compareIsTooCloseOrMinor

        public boolean compareIsTooCloseOrMinor(CentroidFromNpoints point,
                                        int minDistance)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Compares is point too close to any point at pool of current coordinates. If is too close, checks which point has composed of bigger group of points.
        Parameters:
        point - the CentroidFromNpoints
        minDistance - the minimum distance to points
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
